product_name: Moving Comfort NoChill Half-Zip Top - Women's - 2012 Closeout
long_description: Layer the Moving Comfort NoChill half-zip top over a light shirt for chilly morning runs. Semi-fitted top has a soft, brushed interior and smooth face that provides warmth and light wind resistance. DriLayer(R) NoChill fabric keeps you dry and comfortable by transferring moisture away from skin where it can evaporate. Lock-down zipper lets you ventilate on the go; zipper garage helps prevent chin abrasion. Thumbholes secure sleeves over hands for warmth. Zippered handwarmer pockets. Closeout.
short_description: Layer the Moving Comfort NoChill half-zip top over a light shirt for chilly morning runs. Semi-fitted top has a soft, brushed interior and smooth face that provides warmth and light wind resistance.
